Deficiency Narrative: One of two child records reviewed presented contradicting information that was not verified by the operation which thus failed to follow-up on the child's overall history.
Correction Narrative: Administrator Pamela Rodriguez emailed an updated assessment form to gain additional information pertaining to a gathering better, more accurate, history for a child being placed at the operation.

Deficiency Narrative: There out of three staff records were reviewed, and all three were missisg part of othe inforamtion for recording.
Correction Narrative: The operation had updated the statement signed and dated by the employee indicating the employee must immediately report any suspected incident of child abuse, neglect, or exploitation to the Texas Abuse and Neglect Hotline to include the operations administrator or administrators designee.
